Privileges by object types
User access to System objects is controlled by
access permission
settings, which include a set of privileges (permissions and restrictions).
Each object type has a specific set of privileges depending on its functions.
Abbreviations may be used in the System interface for convenience and compact display of information.
Below is a list of privileges by object type, along with a description of access permission values.
Object Type
The following privileges are available for "Object type" type objects:
Read
Write
Create type instances
Delete
Read type instances
Edit type instances
Delete type instances
R
W
C
D
IR
IW
ID
Object
The following privileges are available for "Object" type objects:
Read
Write
Delete
R
W
D
Algorithm
The following privileges are available for "Algorithm" type objects:
Read
Write
Run
Delete
R
W
E
D
Data Source
The following privileges are available for "Data source" type objects:
Read
Write
Run
Delete
R
W
E
D
Permission
The following privileges are available for "Permission" type objects:
Read
Write
Run
Delete
R
W
E
D
Start page
The following privileges are available for "Start page" type objects:
Read
Write
Run
Delete
R
W
E
D
AI Assistant
The following privileges are available for "AI Assistant" type objects:
Read
Write
Run
Delete
R
W
E
D
Calculation Module. Reporting form indicators
The following privileges are available for "Calculation Module. Reporting form indicators" type objects:
Read
Write
Run
Delete
R

Calculation Module. Calculated indicator
The following privileges are available for "Calculation Module. Calculated indicator" type objects:
Read
Write
View calculated indicator breakdown
Delete
R
W
CT
D
The value
F
is displayed when all the above-mentioned access permissions are granted.
By default, the object creator and the administrative group have the full set of access permissions when an object is created.
